website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and stylish bookshelf that folds flat and comes already assembled, so all you have to do is open it up.
pros: Available in light and dark finishes
Will not wobble or come unlocked once set up
cons: The shelf is expensive for its size, so it's not the best choice if you're on a tight budget

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bookcase although I used it for my Kitchen Herbs and Spices. Since I am a Wife and a Cook this Shelf if full of jars and I think I might get another one in the future. My husband likes it too, he was surprise when this arrived and he think he will need to assemble it. But he was like "Awesome". The material itself is so classy. It matched in our floor as you can see in my attached photo. Awesome packaging as well. No scratch at all. Great investment and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Rose Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: I have five bookcases in my living room full of cookbooks. I collect them. But since I am now a senior citizen and spend my time in bed, mostly, I needed a narrow bookcase to fit next to my night table. This is to put books I that I like very much and my stuff I like to keep handy. This bookcase comes all put together, real wood and looks fabulous! It is not a real heavy duty bookcase, but works just great for my use. I am so pleased with it. It looks so nice! I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle ShopShop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a simple and easy shelf
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I bought 2 shelving units. They shipped quickly, and it was so easy to set up. Just open and set up. The second bigger one got slightly damaged in transit on the corner, but so insignificant I didn't send back. I would recommend using the wall brackets included for safety. I am using it with a TV unit.
customer_reviews.author: DKeen

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase -- it's exactly what I needed for a narrow space in my kitchen. It took one minute to assemble, i.e., open the sides and fold down the shelves. It is very well made of solid wood and I am totally pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was truly "no assembly." Open the box and open the sides, pull down the shelves. It's quite sturdy. And, though it is not fine furniture, it is really quite stunning. I bought this for my office for a problem corner. I need my wide screen TV for business news and my other options (end tables) looked junky. This is just perfect. It's high enough I can see the TV, thin enough to fit the spot. And each shelf is ample to hold items without looking cluttered. (I haven't applied the back wall attachment brackets. It's in its own corner.) Excellent, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy97210

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son and his fiance and their first apartment. They needed bookcases about didn't want anything bulky right now since they will be moving again. I took a chance when I saw how this folded that it would be sturdy enough. It was delivered today on time, with a nice flat box that had a handle. It was well packed and I had it open in about 5 minutes. The only slight :assembly" is the top shelf which was 2 screws. It looks very nice and I my son thought it was great that it folded and can be carried in his car.I got the walnut finish and it looked nicely finished.
customer_reviews.author: pilates lover

customer_reviews.title: NOT Espresso and Poorly Assembled
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I ordered espresso but this bookcase is cherry. Cherry isn't even a color option during ordering and the box says espresso so I'm not sure how I got cherry, but it's definitely red. Second, this bookshelf is no assembly required yet all the pieces separated from each other and I had to put it all back together. It's scratched, hinges aren't screwed in all the way, and where there are nail holes there are no nails. It's terribly wobbly fully assembled. I couldn't be more disappointed with this $130 bookshelf. What a let-down. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Delgado

customer_reviews.title: I love Stony-Edge products
customer_reviews.text: This is the third piece I've purchased. The quality of workmanship is fantastic and I love having these striking pieces of furniture in my space. They are so easy to put together and honestly, the instructions are hilarious and fun to go through, even though you really barely need them. Amazon sent the wrong color to me this time and Stony-Edge reached right out to help me correct the problem. Fortunately, Amazon and I were already on it, but I was grateful for the prompt customer service. Now, just keep making more and interesting pieces that I'll desperately need. Okay? :)
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive
customer_reviews.text: It was very well packed. It came with CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS for assembling the top shelf. All tools needed were included. Took about an hour to assemble. The bottom 3 shelves unfolded and fell into position. Top shelf required included tools plus a Phillips screw driver. It's sturdy. I have books and binders in the bottom 3 shelves. IT hold A LOT of books. I have a basket for mail and a small statue on the top shelf. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bookcase that I can move myself and this is perfect. I move nearly every year and need furniture that looks good, but doesn't weigh 500 lbs. This arrived in about 5 days and was very well packaged. Everything was in good shape and had it put together in less than 5 minutes. There are screws that come with it to keep shelves in place but I didn't feel the need to use them. It's a great size and looks well made. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with finish
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought the Stony-Edge bookcase of the exact size and I was disappointed with this one. The first one was beautifully finished with a satin finish that feels very smooth to the touch but the second one had no finish at all just bare unfinished wood that that is quite rough (it might have been stained but no protective finish). I would send it back if it wasn't that would take long time to repackage it. It is too bad because I actually waited for this bookcase to be restocked by amazon rather than buying one from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rousselle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf is presented in a sturdy box with a handle. The folding bookshelf is neatly packed; includes instructions; a couple of screws to secure the top shelf. The instructions are easy to understand; the bookshelf, assembles right from the box and it is impressive. I put favorite books on it and accented my book display with my figurines. I'm so pleased at the transformation of my apartment. It helped me to be organized and to get my books from off the floor and to start enjoying them and admiring my collections. I will buy more bookshelves in the future. Thank you Stony Brook!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. The bookcase was packed adequately so it arrived with no damage. Basically it just needed to be opened up/unfolded to stand in place. However, the top shelf did have a couple of screws (which are provided) that needed to be put into to pre-drilled holes to help keep the top shelf in place. It stands sturdy enough on it's own but there was also included hardware to attach it to a wall if want to. By the way, I'm a female over 75 years old, not mechanically inclined and it took me only about ten minutes to unwrap and set up the whole bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality -- very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The final product assembled and installed "exceeds expectations". The shipment was well padded and arrived with no damage. Assembly was easy--just four Philips head screws. The wood is straight and clear, and comes unfinished. The assembly from the factory was well done. No defects anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: WRR

customer_reviews.title: I could not believe how easy it was to "assemble" them - it was basically ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these units to help me rearrange and reorganize my study/media room. They arrived on time, well packaged and intact. I could not believe how easy it was to "assemble" them - it was basically unfold the sides and shelves. They were functional within minutes. The biggest problem I had was disposing of the box they came in. They look lovely and hold the books and DVD's I needed them for. They have helped me organize what was a cluttered area and managed to look great at the same time. They are surprisingly strong and I am impressed with their looks, functionality, and ease of "assembly". Good job Stony-Edge!
customer_reviews.author: Zuker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions exactly as depicted on website. I almost didn't order the bookcase, because of the negative comments... but decided to take a chance. I am so glad I did ordered 2 bookcases. The bookcase was easy to assemble... it took about 10 minutes to install the top shelf. I have it overloaded with book... (see attached photos)... the bookcase is sturdy and looks exactly as depicted on the website.
customer_reviews.author: DiannaScott

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product feels and looks cheap, the finish is marginal at best, materials weak and construction low end. The unit wobbles with the slightest pressure, not for heavier objects. There is some assembly of the top shelf(which is the same as the other shelves that came preassembled ), I assume to save on shipping and some labor on their end. I am sorry to say this is one of the most disappointing purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Carol Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy Setup & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold work related items. It's nice and study (the box was a bit heavy). I like its size -- not too wide or tall and good shelf depth -- so it fits in the smaller space I needed it to go. It was more expensive that what I was hoping to pay, but I don't regret purchasing because it look nice, fits in smaller space while offering good storage, and was easy to assemble. (It comes with screws for the top shelf only, but I didn't use them because it's holding lightweight items.)
customer_reviews.author: Kim - Houston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I love this book shelf! It is so easy to assemble! That's because I didn't have to do anything other than take it out of the box and put it against the wall and unfold and lower the shelves! The color is lighter color wood than the picture looks but it actually matched my other furniture better than I thought it would. Make sure to look at the measurements cause it is very small. I new this when I ordered and I live in an apartment so I wanted it to be small but just looking at the picture it appears to be much larger. I also ordered the tv stand that matches and they go great together!
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 3 of these shelves now each for a different room. My husband has a bad back so the simplicity of putting it together is awesome. They look great and are very sturdy and high quality. We have 2 in natural and 1 in espresso and love them all. The price is higher than similar shelves but it was worth it to us because of how well made they are and without the headache of putting furniture together. My DH back is thankful!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with Product & Seller ...!
customer_reviews.text: I think I love everything about this folding bookshelf, and it was definitely right for the space I had it in mind for. It came promptly and well-packed; and as they promised, it was easy to assemble. It looks absolutely great and has "substance" to it - it's not flimsy at all as some of these fold-out products can be. There was a little glitch with the hardware, but I contacted the folks at Stony-Edge and they more than made it right ... :) All in all, I'd say this is a great company, committed to making good-looking, sturdy items, and who offer friendly, useful communications and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bookcase for my office that was sturdy and looked nice. This is perfect. I was concerned that the shelves might not be spaced far enough to hold notebooks, but they are. If you are looking for some storage for an office or bedroom and you have a small space, you might want to consider this book case. Very easy to get out of the box and ad the top shelf. I have NEVER put anything together in my life because I have a husband, brothers and nephews. I did this by myself in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Stony-Edge Folding bookcase. No Assembly..NO KIDDING!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bookshelf!! I'm so tired of assembling cabinets, shelves, desks, etc. so to open this box (which had excellent packaging and even a handle!) and find a bookshelf that just had to be folded open was AMAZING !!! I was disappointed when I ordered this at first because all my furniture is white and the only option is natural or black...however the glossy natural wood finish is so beautiful that I don't think that I will paint it. The wood is very sturdy and thick. These shelves will hold heavy books without a problem. I highly recommend this Stony-Edge Folding bookcase and I have already ordered a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyKay

customer_reviews.title: Solid but poor finishing touches
customer_reviews.text: Shelf was solid, sturdy, and cleanly made, but the finishes were cheap: sharp edges and corners, no rounding or "softening"; it looked cheap and unprofessional - not worth the $160 price. At that price I felt like it should look and feel better. I wanted it very much because the four shelves and overall width are rare, but I just couldn't see keeping it at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Compton

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the arse to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, real wood bookcase. But the wood is pine? Not sure. It is ok fine quality but priced way too high. And the assembly was NOT easy peasy like they stated. The top shelf requires 2 brackets inserts and 4 tiny screws that are impossible to get an angle on. After 2 hours of trying, I settled for one screw on each side. It is not out of the box ready
customer_reviews.author: JAMI O.

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described. lightweight. using it in grandkids' plnayroom. for books and toddler toys. as suggested, attached to wall so it won't fall over. its on carpeting and and i have wood trim, so bookcase is not close to wall and I needed to use slightly larger brackets. not a problem... it's an old house so often needs some tweaking. wood matches anther shelving item I've for years. looks great. may buy one more or the one half as wide. would buy again. delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Theresa

customer_reviews.title: These bookcases are great - very sturdy and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: These bookcases are great - very sturdy and well packaged. Directions were very simple and clear. Besides unfolding the sides and lowering 3 of the shelves, you do have to turn the product around to install the top shelf, which I was able to do by myself. My only disappointment was the shelves were not high enough to hold our records, but they make a very handsome bookcase. Nice dark espresso color.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I now have six Stony-Edge Folding Bookcases, including one in the larger size, and could not be happier with them. I live in a small house but have a very large book collection--these work great as additions to my taller book cases. I have two in my bedroom, two in my home office, one by my dining table, and one next to a taller bookcase. They are sturdy and look beautiful. Plus they are very easy to move. --Suza Francina, author and avid reader
customer_reviews.author: Suza Francina

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and a breeze to set up. And the idea that they are foldable is great. Great packaging also. No parts floating around. Parts consist of one small bag which contains 4 small screws and 2 brackets...Takes about 5 minutes to assemble...
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Okay bookshelf, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf is a lot flimsier than it looks. When mine arrived one of the back supports was broken, although that was easy enough to fix with wood glue; however, even ignoring this, the bookshelf is pretty wobbly and I wouldn't expect it to stay up in an earthquake or whatever. It *is* made of real solid wood so it's not completely terrible, and it's adequate for my needs, but I'd still not expect to pay more than $40-50 for this. Way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

customer_reviews.title: The best bookshelf so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had such a bad experience with other bookshelves on the market, which were heavy yet flimsy being made from MDF boards, that I didn't expect this one would be much better. So I ordered it for my closet to put light clothes only. However, when it arrived, I was pleasantly surprised on how good it is - light and sturdy, it also is quite attractive. I don't even want to hide it in my closet anymore. I will for sure be ordering another one as a bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Customer11

customer_reviews.title: From purchase to use — Easy.
customer_reviews.text: There is not one thing that I am unhappy with this shelving unit. I have a shorter one in natural wood and this one is just taller. It comes in a carton, you remove and unwrap. Then you open close the side panels and put the shelves in place. They are already in place. The only shelf that needs to be put on with hardware in the top one. In less than twelve minutes from unwrapping it is in place. You can’t really get much easier. It’s sturdy, has clean lines, and as a plus it holds books toys and stuffed animals of my granddaughter. Would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The pricetag ($109) led me expect more than flimsy materials and almost non-existent finish. Similar or inferior to 3-tier folding shelves available on Amazon in the $40-range. For mysterious reasons, one has to screw in the top shelf oneself (I suspect to save on shipping). I would be returning this if I didn't happen to need a 16"-wide shelf.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Easy! Assembles in minutes
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bookcase to store books (mostly softcover) and wanted something that could fit in a small space and didn't take hours to assemble. I was also not looking for fine furniture, just something simple and functional. We had it fully assembled in less than 5 minutes. It works perfectly for our purpose, although I would not put extremely heavy items on it. It's a bit wobbly on carpet due to the light weight of the bookcase but includes hardware to secure to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the task at hand
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer purchased this for bottled water, I did the same (the 2 gallon size that you refill at the store). It sits in my dining area in between the kitchen entrance and the door out to the backyard. When that door is open, I only had 16 inches to work with. This was perfect for the task. The wood is beautiful. My cousin was so impressed, she is going to get one. My UPS driver was delighted that the box had a handle. Well, simple things. Really though, packed well. Arrived in great shape. Extremely happy with this purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: cld

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, includes wall brackets for child safety
customer_reviews.text: We got this mini shelf for the small (but growing) book collection in our bedroom. The assembly was minimal, and was only to screw on the top shelf, that would have made the shipping box bigger if it was left attached. The bottom and middle shelves come attached, and the whole thing collapses for easy transport. Lastly, there were a couple of wall brackets, so if you have little ones and don't want them trying to climb up the thing and have it fall on them. Overall, I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: OnFyre

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to place on opposite sides of the window in what was otherwise unused space. Fit nicely and are a neutral color so blends in well. Super easy to assemble. Box came with a handle! this is the mark of a company that actually THINKS! Instructions were whimsical.I really like this company and will look for them first whenever I buy something they make
customer_reviews.author: Zenster

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase, not worth $150.
customer_reviews.text: Is it usefu? Yes-easy to put together, relatively stable, perfect size. However, it is in no way worth $150. $100 would be the upper limit to pay, and even that would be too much for a small, unfinished wood bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: MGM1962

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Sturdy, and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bookcase is made out of actual wood and can hold a heavy load on each shelf. Hard-to-find feature in a less-expensive bookcase. No complaints—looks great, fits the narrow space I have, and accommodates many books and/or display items. I also love that the shelves are deep and tall enough for larger books.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaTG

customer_reviews.title: Poor execution of a basically good design
customer_reviews.text: In a few words, it was flimsy. Disappointing. Staples were used where screws could and should have been. Poor execution of a basically good design. Even without the damage it arrived with it swayed with just a touch: structurally poor.
customer_reviews.author: mercyme

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not perfect, little shelf unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is exactly the dimensions and color I was looking for; I needed a shelf unit to store my DVD collection. It's not the stablest shelf ever, but it's good enough. Hardware to attach it to the wall is included if it comes to that. Assembly was not particularly difficult. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, but if you really have hard bound books
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but if you really have hard bound books, and lot of them, it is not sturdy--at all. I a be a chair on either side because I am afraid it is going to fall over. Will have to use some bracing on the back. It comes with brackets to attach to the wall, but we don't have the option of doing that
customer_reviews.author: Kayla White

customer_reviews.title: Easy Storage
customer_reviews.text: I wish all shelves came pre-assembled as this one is. I have bought 5 of these book cases and all I have to do is take it from the box and open it up and, presto, more storage shelves. The shelves are deep so they can be used for storage or bookshelves. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, no tools required and fits good amount of books and stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and easy to set up bookshelf. No tools are required and looks great. Just be careful not to overload it with super heavy items. Once assembled it does wobble slightly, but considering it came virtually pre-assembled and already has the hardware already embedded this is a minor issue. The important thing to consider is bookshelf is for items like books, blu-rays and other similar weighted items and not your kettle bells, bowling balls, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Utah

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality. Unfortunately there was some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. Unfortunately there was some assembly required. The top shelf was not attached. Contacted Stony-Edge and got a reply the next business day. They said that because of shipping damage that had occurred in some cases, the top shelf was sent detached. The assembly was really easy as described in the instructions, just a little more difficult because of my arthritis. The Amazon description should be updated to "minor assembly required - top shelf". P.S. they offered me a 25% credit. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MAO

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase but shipping is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bookcase. I am taking off 2 stars because this came horribly packaged and top left corner wood was cracked and there was some scratches on top shelf. I am honestly surprised that's all that was damaged considering how bad it was packaged. I decided to just keep it because it would be a pain to send it back, it would be just easier to glue the corner. Assembly is practically nil, just unfold it, takes about 5-10 seconds. Over all it looks nice, and held all my books with no issues, even my really heavy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rino

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good color & fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This book shelf is very sturdy & is good quality. I didn't know if I would like it or not when I first ordered. But when it came it went together so quickly & the instructions are truly the cutest I have ever seen. Thanks for building something that will last many years! I get sick if the low quality, cheap stuff that seems to be everywhere around. So I was glad you sell quality at an affordable price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one so much I bought another. Love that they are not particle board, but are real wood. They are very easy to set up...3 shelves just flip down once you open the sides up then the top shelf attaches with 2 screws and a bracket. Light weight and easy to carry upstairs after assembly. Look nice in my room and definitely hold all my books. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bookshelf to hold large and medium sized texbooks, cookbooks. This shelf did not disappoint. The shelves are sturdy and are not bowing under the weight. It was very easy to set up and it looks nice, too!. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marrero

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy this is to "assemble"
customer_reviews.text: It literally just unfolds out of the box - you can use it as is, or add the top shelf if you desire. Either way in ~5 minutes you've got a nice and new set of shelves ready to go in no time. I find the shelves sturdy. They don't sway if I rock them, and I have them packed with books and law binders - all holds up, no issue at all. There may be cheaper or prettier shelves out there, if you're willing to break out the tools and assemble them one painstaking piece at a time. But if you hate doing that, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Simon

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up for a well-made bookcase
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to assemble since it really only needs 4 screws hand twisted in with a Philips screwdriver. The holes are pre-drilled. The other 3 shelves just fold out into place. There are also two optional brackets to secure it to the wall for children's safety or in earthquake prone areas. Sturdy shelves with a light clear finish. Very easy and well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: K. Glasscock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was so easy to put together. You only have to attach the top shelf and that was done with a screwdriver. This shelving unit is perfect for the spot by my reading chair. And if I ever want to rearrange my room and can move this unit with relative ease. The wood is solid and not pressed boards. I wouldn't be surprised to find me purchasing another one for a different room. It is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: This folding bookcase is quite nice. The shelf is sturdy, finished smoothly, and I like the natural wood color. For my purposes, I purchased a wooden cutting board and hot glued it on the top to have an extra shelf. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good, steady, but...
customer_reviews.text: The top shelf needed to be screw on. Not a big deal, but 20% assembly required if you want the 4th shelf on top. It holds a good number of books and has sides so the books wouldn't fall out. Makes this book lover happy. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Small Bookcase requiring no assembly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a place to display my small "tchotchka", framed photos, small pieces of art and crafts, a tray I bought on a trip to Viet Nam, etc. and did not want this new piece of furniture to take up much space in my living room. This bookcase is ideal! It did not require assembly, just unfolding the sides and the shelves and it looks great! It was delivered on time, as is typical of Amazon's wonderful delivery service, and in excellent condition. Thank you for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit unsure about buying this bookcase, but I loved that it folded and I didn't have to put anything together. Now, that I have it here and all set up and filled with some books, I'm glad I bought it. It's sturdy and can hold some weight. I plan to buy a few more later down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a very tight space in my kitchen and it works perfectly for the space and for storing my cookbooks and recipe boxes. It has pretty sturdy construction and it's nicely finished, leaving the beauty of the wood grain to show through. I would buy this again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A BARGAIN FOR REAL WOOD and assembled too!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the workmanship of this piece! The price is unbeatable it makes me want to look and probably purchase other pieces for my apartment. It is real wood and not pressboard and that in itself makes me want to purchase other pieces. I wish I would have known about this vendor sooner, Now that I have and it's already assembled too! there's no excuse. It looks like I paid way more then I actually did. This company has found a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Using in our pantry
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is great. It looks good, is very sturdy and there’s no real assembly. We’re re-doing a closet that we’ve used as a pantry for years and this is perfect. We actually bought two after we saw how nice the first one was.
customer_reviews.author: MGF

customer_reviews.title: i am a little old lady,
customer_reviews.text: just short of 80 yrs old. i had no problem unboxing, unfolding and managing the screws. if i had my son nearby, i would have asked him to do it! but, i did it myself. it looks good, nice wood. i heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Glough

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Well built product, and easy to assemble. Looks nice. This unit was a little smaller than I expected, but that was my own fault. The picture makes it look like a full size bookcase, and it's not. Please read the dimensions carefully ;-). They're a little spendy for the size, but they ARE sturdy. I'd recommend more for a corner or small area.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Came with a broken shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, but its not as sturdy as it could be. And, one of the shelves was completely broken. Fortunately wood glue works. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Furr-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Folding Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered I had to return one entire side of the bookcase from top to bottom the screw and shelf brackets were broken off and part of the wood was broken off. The second one that I received had no defects it was easy to assemble and it was sturdy. I gave it 4 stars value for the money because the finish in spots is rough to the touch for the money I expected a more professional finish.
customer_reviews.author: S. Niffenegger

customer_reviews.title: The best home bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bookshelf , it’s sturdy , takes a minute to ‘assemble’ it’s basically folded and put together , looks nice , I already ordered and received the larger size , and can’t wait to get another ! You won’t be sorry you ordered this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesmum27

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a folding self that didn't need to be assembled. This is just what I was hoping for. It's very sturdy. I use it in my walk-in closet. I will probably order more for the other bedrooms walk-ins.
customer_reviews.author: ljoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We very much like everything about this shelf! Ordering was easy and delivery was prompt. It is as described. Shelf is being used as a bedside table, bookshelf, and storage in a dorm room. It fit perfectly, it is sturdy, durable, and, most importantly, it's real wood with no odor or offgassing. We especially appreciate this because of the small space with non-opening windows. This shelf helped us in our effort to stay as green as possible with regard to indoor air quality. We would definitely recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Dooped
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it is but honestly the color is Cherry and I am not happy about top shelf having to be put on. This was a "no assembly required" item yet it has to be assembled a bit. I gave 3 stars because it is really good quality. And some other reviewers mentioned and I agree, that there are groves in the back side of the shelves that make no sense. I was planning on buying more items from this collection but the color seems to be biggest factor in NOT buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! It came within two days
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It came within two days. All I did was open the box, unflap the shelves and wa la , a beautiful, assembled , wooded shelf. Doesn't get any easier than this because I can't build anything. Just make sure you have a screw driver for the screws on the top shelf, if not you'll be fine. I used my key. lol I'm happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The easiest assembly ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was so cool. It came out of the box and unfolded assembled except for top shelf. Love it. I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Rayrunn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase. It came out of the box and just required unfolding to be ready to use and that was great. I was impressed how sturdy this is and how deep the shelves are. You can load this up with those outsized heavy books with no problem and if your books aren't so outsized there is room on the shelf in front of the books for odds and ends. I appreciated that it came with brackets for securing it to the wall. Though I didn't use these it is nice that that option was readily available. I felt that this was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KnitWytch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelves
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of these bookshelves over the course of a long elementary school teaching career. They are sturdy and will hold many more books than you imagine is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookcase to use as a towel holder in my bathroom. It was overpriced for what it is (a couple days after I received and installed it, Amazon sent me emails showing almost identical products for almost half what I paid for this). That said, it was easy to assemble and way too much trouble to return for one that cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Bev B

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful. It looks wonderful in my living room
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. It looks wonderful in my living room. Clever the way it folds open to set up and down to close. I have books and figurines on it. I will be another one for sure....
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it is exactly what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking all over town for a small thin bookshelf that was made of wood and couldn't find one. While browsing through Amazon I found this bookshelf and it seemed to be exactly what I needed. I love it and it is exactly what I was looking for. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of books? Heavy books? Want a strong bookcase that doesn't look like heavy furniture? Get this...
customer_reviews.text: The bookcases (we ordered three of them) were well-packed, easy to assemble (a couple of screws to attach the top shelf), and quite strong (to hold books). We have a small one in the kitchen holding cookbooks and one in the playroom to hold the book collection that didn't fit on the library shelves and one in the loft (more books). They look nice and work well!
customer_reviews.author: D. Stein

customer_reviews.title: My favorite racks - so easy!
customer_reviews.text: We measured and purchased as many as we could fit in our closet. It’s definitely an improvement. These are great shelves & shoe racks. They look good & are easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Blevins-Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy good bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase. There really isn't any assembly required, which is great for my office. Its small, but very sturdy and can hold a lot of books. It also frees up so much room in my closet. Looks great just about anywhere. I plan on buying more for other rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Irene F.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to have bought an inexpensive no assembly shelf that is compact but sturdy enough for my limited spaces. The product came with a wall mount but I placed my heavy books at the bottom shelf to stabilize the shelf. So far, the shelf has not bent. The bookcase was heavy but well packaged in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: adboble

customer_reviews.title: EASY assembly!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shelves. So many uses. Have them in our bathrooms for extra storage and in the living room and den as bookcases and displaying knick knacks. Great quality at a great price. Arrived quickly with no damage. I've ordered 5 and going to order two more to use as bookcases!
customer_reviews.author: Delores White

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf, but a tad cheap
customer_reviews.text: Small amount of assembly required when you unbox it but after that it folds with no disassembly or tools. Does exactly what I needed it to do. The construction is a little wobbly and the wood is a little light/the finish is rough; not everything fits together quite snugly. Fully functional, though.
customer_reviews.author: adam793

customer_reviews.title: Stony-Edge Bookcases.
customer_reviews.text: The Stony-Edge Bookcase looks smart in my bedroom and was very easy to unpack with no assembly required just unfolding. The size is perfect and I ordered two to fit on each side of the doorway. To me quality and value are very important and I am pleased with these items.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in a small space in my office. Right beside my computer desk - holding work items and folders so the desk can be clean for work. Easy to put together - nice quality - relatively lightweight but sturdy enough for storage. As usual, Amazon delivered quickly - and the product was worthy of their name.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sure you're paying a little extra for the convenience of it being foldable but it sure is convenient! Looks nice and took 5 minutes to assemble. No damage in shipping and light weight without being cheap and flimsy. I might get a second one eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice, slim shelf for those with limited space
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slim shelf that could fit in a small area and this was perfect. It arrived intact and was easy to assemble. It seems sturdy enough for my purposes. The shelves easily fold up if you need them to for easy transport. The shelf is also rather handsome.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Phan

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't have time to write product reviews but this product was so easy to use and good quality that I'd like to let others know about it. I needed some more bookshelves with a pleasant bright look, and this was so easy and fast to put together. I'm not an expert, but it looks as if the shelves are real wood, or at least tougher than the common sandwich boards used.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Farb

customer_reviews.title: Got much more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is very well made and it requires no assembly, unless you decide to anchor it to a wall (bolts included). I did not need to do anything other than to set it up and fill it up. Just the right width and height for my small apartment. My order was promptly handled and shipped, arriving as expected and very well packaged. I can honestly say I got more than I expected and I probably will purchase more from this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and his video collection. It is very sturdy real wood and extremely easy to setup. It was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Too dark but well made
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was easy to assemble and fits nicely in a small space. It also has bars in the back so things won't accidentally fall off. However this bookcase is basically black, not brown.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebee86

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these bookcases in different sizes. They work great, nice quality. Very easy to assemble. Loaded with books, no stability issue.
customer_reviews.author: hulagirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Worth every $$
customer_reviews.text: Great bookcase -- packed really well -- very well made. I would definitely recommend securing it to wall especially around children/pets. Like the fact I can move it easily from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and so easy
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and only four phillips head screws to install it, unless you live in a earthquake area and need to attach it to the wall. getting it out of the box was the hardest part. other than that it's pretty much fold and go
customer_reviews.author: glenn t.

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN I'D HOPED FOR!
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT FIND ENOUGH SUPERLATIVES!! The shelf unit is beautifully made, and set up in seconds. If I lived in an earthquake zone, I would have taken the extra minutes to anchor it to the wall and render it rigid. (Hardware for these steps were included.) It is a product of fine craftsmanship, worth the price, and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Merrit Svenson

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf was unattached!
customer_reviews.text: Box intact and top shelf is sitting in the box. How do I attach this and why should I have to! Save your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally easy to assemble. Filled it full of hardbacks and paperbacks. Looks great! I would secure it to walk if you have little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah HIerro

customer_reviews.title: classy look
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (top shelf only) Do recommend that you mount it to wall with brackets supplied especially if you have small children. It is light weight and could tip easily by a small child. The color was perfect. I was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: gary feenstra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this compact portable bookshelf. Shipping was prompt, arrived in perfect condition with all necessary hardware, assembly was a breeze, and it’s very well made. Perfect for small spaces. We are using it in a small shed turned into a study space for my daughter’s online college classes. She will use it in her dorm room when classes resume on campus.
customer_reviews.author: cwhit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bookcase with very little assembly. Only needed to put in 4 screws with my son holding it steady. Seems sturdy enough that I didn't need to anchor it so I appreciate that. So no power tools needed. I enjoyed the humorous instructions too. Wish all furniture could be so easy!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase. Works perfectly for my usage (lightweight vertical ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bookcase. Works perfectly for my usage (lightweight vertical storage). There were no imperfections in the finish, and the bookcase was pretty easy to set up as advertised. 4/5 stars because it's not *really* no assembly, the top shelf needs to be installed (quick, 5-10 minute installation) which was unexpected but not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product - You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bookshelf for the value. It is small enough to fit in tight spots but sturdy enough to hold up to 10 textbooks on a shelf. And I don't want to leave out an important consideration- no assembly required. The vendor for this item is amazing. Highly oriented toward customer service and goes above and beyond to be sure you are satisfied. Even better, they initiated communication to determine my level of customer satisfaction with an email that couldn't help but make me smile. What more do you want in purchasing? I would highly recommend this product and vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bookcase is exactly like the picture. It arrived promptly and in excellent condition. Very easy to set up and quite sturdy. Perfect for the small space we had for it. Will be buying another one soon. 2nd one arrived with a broken shelf - easy return via UPS and replacement arrived a few days later in perfect condition. Superb service.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

product_meta.title: Stony-Edge Folding Bookcase, Easy Assembly Bookshelf for Home Office Storage. 32” Espresso
product_meta.description: Size:32"| Color:EspressoLow Assembly Folding Bookshelf. Goodbye Clutter, Hello Innovation Are you tired of presenting your favorite books on a bookcase that's immobile, clunky, or plain? Each time someone walks into your home, they learn a little more about you. And more than anything, your bookcase showcases your knowledge, personality and individuality. Stony-Edge is here to help you take care of your books with a beautiful high-quality bookcase that's easy to manage, looks great and can be placed almost anywhere! Stony-Edge folding bookcase displays your books and photos with pride. The Stony-Edge folding bookcase adds extra shelving in an instant with four tall shelves that provide plenty of space for books, photos, decor, or your favorite trinkets. With its airy, spindle-side design, this smart wood bookcase will look right at home in any room. The 4-Tier folding bookshelf arrives one easy step from fully assembled—screw a few screws, unfold it, flip it and it's ready to go! Add style to your room now! Stony-Edge's contemporary styled folding bookshelf bridges the gap between traditional and modern. With a minimalist construction, this bookcase lets you easily see what books you have available, gives you a decorative piece to add to any room and can be moved around to suit your layout. There is no limit to what you can do with this folding wooden bookcase. This 4-Tier piece is ideal for storage or as a decorative element in the home. Both sturdy and foldable, the Stony-Edge folding bookcase is truly versatile. Ideal for Apartments, Home and the College Dorm Need some instant vertical space? Want a place for your leather-bound collection of Tom Clancy novels? This is the shortest and sweetest assembly story ever told. Once again, Stony-Edge steps up with another smart, simple and easy solution—the amazing folding bookcase/media center. Books are displayed beautifully and won’t tumble out the backside. Heavier books are no problem with four shelves each capable of holding 150 pounds of weighty literature or equipment ready to fill in minutes. One screwdriver, next-to-no time and absolutely no tantrums. Assemble instantly, grab a book and start reading.
feature_bullets: Entire BOOKSHELF is constructed from one type of single-source, knock-on-wood, real wood. HIGH QUALITY WOOD delivers epic novel-holding strength and long life. No cracking, splitting, separating and no kidding

ONE SCREWDRIVER, four screws, no sweat, no blistering, no trips to the hardware store, no yelling at the cat, no four hours of brain cell abuse SIMPLICITY is our mantra. BOOKS, journals, magazines and knick-knacks in place in a few minutes. SIMPLICITY is our mantra. BOOKS, journals, magazines and knick-knacks in place in a few minutes

By getting your Bookcase today, You have made a brilliant, thumbs-up, no-regrets decision. If for any reason you have questions, issues or just want to share your buyer's-joy-our professional CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM is standing by to assist you

A CLASSIC LOOK that's unexpectedly AFFORDABLE. Position anywhere in the room, bookcase is finished on all sides. Special attention has been given to the paint finish for quality and consistency of color. Stony-Edge furnishes you with pride

Your BOOKCASE is packed as well as we built your bookcase. No loose ends or loose anything else. We make certain that your bookcase won't sound like a maraca when it arrives. Safe passage and happy landings to all. Simple, IN-A-SNAP INSTRUCTIONS included
